name: map-canvas
readme: ## map-canvas A map widget for [blessed-contrib](https://github.com/yaronn/blessed-contrib). Written by Yaron Naveh ([@YaronNaveh](http://twitter.com/YaronNaveh)) Based on [http://geeksretreat.wordpress.com/2012/04/26/html5s-canvas-lets-draw-the-world/](http://geeksretreat.wordpress.com/2012/04/26/html5s-canvas-lets-draw-the-world/) [More details](https://github.com/yaronn/blessed-contrib)
